PlayState advanced_from_kick () const
 The ball was kicked; advance the state (from ready to playing) if necessary or else do nothing.
 
PlayState advanced_from_normal_start () const
 We got a normal start command; if we're in setup advance to the corresponding restart. nothing.

 Get the corresponding play state for the opposite team (restart team is flipped)
 
PlayState opposite_team (bool do_invert) const
 Helper function to get the play state for the opposite team when the argument is true and the same team when it is false. See opposite_team.
